`` samuel adams samuel cooper dear sir jany 3-79 embrace opportunity offers writing lines. last told many things say particularly concerning l esqrs. 1 could pleasure sitting fire side would freely open mind chuse upon paper considering risque falling wrong hands. one gentlemen informd year 74 well acquainted dubious political character appointed delegate congress majority one electors thought vote turnd favor. 75 elected january 3 1779 early attachd men different sentiments delegates brought country strenuously maintaind. difference sentiment said arise local attachments reality arose different principles views. mr ds political principles never could learn. views always appeard commercial interrested. whether mistaken time perhaps soon discover. little known america till year 75 europe. took early decided active part support great cause. london great share open opposition made tyranny british court measures respecting america. turnd attention practice physick regularly educated edinburgh study law. advice able advocates liberties america opinion conceivd promising usefulness cause way. answered prospects. constantly aided agent late mr de berdt 2 knowledge affairs rendered services essential. pen employd america general junius americanus abundantly testifies publications witness attachments massachusetts bay south carolina particular. private letters friends written freedom well zeal would exposd risque even life resentment unprincipled nefarious court accident design fallen hands. know true. must conclude present giving fix 'd opinion founded particular observations joynt combination political commercial men exclude vigilant patriots publick councils employments knowing vigilance unimpeachd unsuspected fidelity effectual bar carrying politico commercial plans execution. 3 write first good opportunity. mean time perfect esteem yr affectionate friend ``

`` william floyd george clinton sr. philadelphia january 3d. 1779. account many difficulties disappointments met crossing north river arrive untill 1st instant. next day attended congress 1 usual business morning reading publick letters receiving reports several committees one january 3 1779 oclock according rule house time standing matters laid congress proceed upon business finance finance taken soon found sundry resolutions long consideration length agreed purpose raising credit currentcy. gentlemen appear sanguine desired good effects wish may must confess great doubts. resolves preamble gone printers. get oppertunity leaves town send. undoubtedly receive officially president soon. two questions importance several states adjutated opinion happily thrown. one prohibit lotteries several states cry bills credit except continental. 2 considered two questions infringing rights legislatures several states glad negatived. last letters france hold us england brink acknowledging independance absolute necessity affairs much embarrassed public affairs nation ever. 3 important news except yesterday heard 22 sail enemys vessels driven shore staten island-which suppose l hear reaches sr. obdit. humble servt. wm. floyd ``

original colonel nicholas rogers maryland received message ct. estaing desiring return. `` l'unite secrette des enterets qui existe entre la france i'espagne et les americans etant plus grande plus durable plus necessaire que celle qui attache les anglais de l'opposition au sort de l'amerique il en resulte que monsr deane avoir plus de confiance dans ces deux puissances que dans des particuliers qui ne voulent uniquement que chasser des ministres pour remplacer. ii semble aussi que sa confiance dans les membres de l'opposition ne doit pas aller jusq leur dire tout ce que la france et l espagne font ou promettent de faire l'esperance de causer une revolution dans le ministre anglais sufferait peutetre pour en rendre la publication aussi avantageux au part de l'opposition qu'elle serait nuisible l'amerique rien est plus redoutter que de voir la bonne volonte se changer en mefiance car en negotiation la mefiance eloigne ceux que l'interet raproche. ii semble aussi qu'il faut soigneusement eviter de compromettre d'embarasser une grande puissance sur des petits objets et cela dans le temps qu'on en espere des grands services c'est encore sur ce point important que les veritables interets de l'amerique different de ceux du parti de l'opposition. `` suspicion farther confirmed mr lees connection ct. de lauregais ct. de'estaing speaks following manner peice mentioned `` thomas burke 's `` epistle\ `` july 16. 1779 epistle hail mighty thomas. 1 whose works seen mangled morris distorted deane whose splendid periods flash lees defence replete every thing common sense. whose labors man e'er wiser invective great monopolizer unfeeling jew turk attack j-y p-a b-ke 2 fervor satiric vein maul abuse mild meek du-e 3 eager traduce worthiest men despise energy drayton 's pen. say name shall dignify lays consecrate sing thy praise pity tell exalted name thou would'st damn 'd eternal fame. shall common sense comus greet thine ear piddling poet puft pamphleteer behold around thee thy triumphs lie reputations hosts thee die envy 's altars hecatombs expire faction fondly lights pupil 's fire. pupil devoted worthless wags quibbling quill true democracy spirit bravely attacks exalted merit. thou pupil worthy attentive care july 16 1779 satan granted earnest prayer brink fate smooth adams stood saw arthur flound'ring flood. plausive richard whose gloomy breast revenge terror stood turns confest doubtful brothers measures defend berkenhout confidant friend breaking thro weak fraternal ties save doctor sacrifice. 't desperate important hour faction trembling tott'ring pow r thus pour 'd vows-\ `` author ev'ry crime. whose pangs shall last beyond reach time crimes pangs give ear sire thy daughter e'er dear e'er obedient father 's call crowds faction fill 'd spacious hall e'er populace possest plung 'd daggers patriot breast forc 'd humanity fly banish 'd justice yon azure sky attend attend attend fav'rites see hopeless eyes fix 'd alone thee oh help save sway o'er opprest like thee like thee rise more.\ `` prayer heard dreadful monarch spoke. hell convuls 'd e'en center shook `` since mankind fix iron reign sin death suffice give payne. `` say mighty thomas awful day first beheld morn 's resplendent ray day envy shall sacred squinting sons shall wait thee. sure mortal mother thee bear rather cholic prince air dusky pinions borne o'er ether 's plain expell 'd thee griping pain. minerva queen sense uncommon owed birth goddess woman softly crept father 's scull small crack n't moon full great common sense surely come crack grisly pluto 's bum. thy origin thy fate war 'gainst virtue deadly hate daily slanders earn thy daily food exalt wicked depress good spent lengthy life evil return unto thy parent devil. ms found reprinted pennsylvania evening post july 16 1779. 1 thomas paine since december 1778 engaged periodically public debate deane-lee controversy recently question american claims northern fisheries. context debate latter issue burke chose moment attack paine see gouverneur morris benjamin towne july 9 1779 note 1. ironically burke 's `` epistle\ `` appeared issue immediately following paine 's public response attack `` cato\ `` gouverneur morris towne printed july 9 issue post. analyzed context verse writings richard walser ed poems governor thomas burke north carolina raleigh n.c. state department archives history 1961 pp. 50-51 66-67. 2 john jay william paca thomas burke. 3 james duane ``

south carolina letter news papers intelligence brief operations combined arms near georgia 2d inst. colo. maitland many troops inclined able made escape beaufort joined general prevost savanna leaving behind whole hospital artillery baggage stores. know swamps colonel must penetrated detail line march really went way would excite mixture compassion laughter. enemy strongly fortified lines redoubts town savanna soil sand sandy clay-their number 3000 exclusive negroes rubbage. count d'estaing landed 5000 troops formed junction general lincoln must command 4000. count pulaski general mckintosh detached southerly probably secure town sunbury 40 miles distant savanna intercept retreating parties land inland navigation country may attempted great prospect success. allies finding general prevost strongly intrenched determind fruitless summon make regular approaches preference assault colo. lomoy chief engineer announced works would complete 1st october expected batteries consisting 38 pieces heavy cannon 8 mortars would open instant 2d 3d. sorties two attempts made beseiged working parties instances assailants beat back suffered greatly killed wounded. flag passed gen. prevost count d'estaing request general passport favor madame prevost plate effects. count replied politeness far respected lady could questioned understood plate ca. acquired way allies master induced october 24 1779 believe general could honor conscience expect enjoy it-or something like. sagitaire taken experiment commanded sir james wallace brave resistance said board experiment general vaughan 20 officers cash paying british troops georgia dispatches found board intimating embarkation 4000 men new york intended carolina consequence ten ships line detached convoying in-this may account fleet lately appeared mouth chesepeak. ariel fowey sloop 18 guns british men war large ship 2200 barrels bread flour large quantity beef pork 4000 suits clothing c. c.-all enemy 's store transport ships fallen french admiral 's hands besides many others captured sea. mr. alexander cameron formerly british deputy superintendent indian affairs southern district prevailed part cherokees break faith south carolina severely chastised general williamson towns provisions totally destroyed cameron driven nation-the general returned would join general lincoln 1000 men 29th 30th september. camps allies perfect health harmony every body full prospect repossessing savanna british general troops wrong governor sir james wright prisoners war within week. excellency well knows make proper abatements jumbled accounts-the bulk believe true doubt many favorable truths untold. `` heard says friend colo. laurens since went georgia commands light infantry letters others learn well 27th septem. reduction savanna intends return general.\ `` received concerning excellency 's aid de camp friend adds deserters enemy came daily. thursday last congress pleased appoint go united states holland informed nature extent commands laid 3 shall better qualified determine propriety accepting charge may mean begin journey towards south carolina 29th inst. 3 every place god pleases lead shall continue bear grateful remembrance excellency 's paternal care country shall count every opportunity testifying love esteem happy event. professions take leave great sincerity subscribe sir much obliged obedient servant henry laurens ``
